message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $8000 for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to lower the price to $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to lower the price to $8000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hello Alice, I've carefully considered your last offer and would like to propose a counteroffer of $7500.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $8000, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your last offer and my previous one. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $7750.
